title: Gift for music
creator_credit: Peter Plummer and Granada Television International
brief_description: A visit to Chetham’s School of Music in Manchester, the first national co-educational school. Includes interviews with children who attend the school and discusses the problem of those who would like to study there but cannot. Considers the raising of school funds to educate talented children.
